body:
Concept ACK. Looks like the only changes to mac_alias between `2.1.1` and `2.2.0` were related to arm64 deployment:
https://github.com/al45tair/mac_alias/pull/11 and https://github.com/al45tair/mac_alias/commit/4034e4da2d137de5e1236408aac3ff5d69f4430c.

I can't test this. Maybe @jarolrod or @Sjors?
